gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Heat 121, Cavaliers 84
gameRecap.excerpt: Miami defeats Cleveland, 121-84. For Miami, Bam Adebayo led the way with 15 points, 16 rebounds, four assists, and a season-high five steals while aided by Haywood Highsmith (18 points (four 3PM), five rebounds) and Jimmy Butler (15 points, six assists) in the victory. Evan Mobley finished with 15 points and four rebounds with Jarrett Allen recording nine points, four rebounds, and three assists for Cleveland in the losing effort. Miami improves to 39-32, while Cleveland moves to 43-28 in the loss.
